function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unequal access to vaccines","Impact":"Prolonged disease spread, social, political, and economic havoc","Mitigation":"Improving vaccine equity, prioritizing distribution, investing in local production","Technologies":"Vaccine distribution technology, local vaccine production technology","People":"Disadvantaged countries, low-income populations","Owner":"Global health organizations, governments, pharmaceutical companies"},{"Description":"Hoarding of vaccines","Impact":"Limited access in certain regions, exacerbation of disease spread","Mitigation":"Global collaboration, equitable distribution, investment in local solutions","Technologies":"Global vaccine distribution technology, local vaccine production technology","People":"Disadvantaged regions, particularly Africa","Owner":"Global health organizations, governments, pharmaceutical companies"},{"Description":"Lack of capacity for local vaccine production","Impact":"Vulnerability to disease outbreaks, limited access to vaccines","Mitigation":"Investing in local production capabilities, technology transfer, research and development","Technologies":"Local vaccine production technology, technology transfer programs","People":"Countries with limited vaccine production capacity","Owner":"Global health organizations, governments, pharmaceutical companies"}]}
